package.name: @website/sugarcss-coffeekraken-io
package.description: The frontend toolkit that works for everyone. Experts, professionals and new-comers
package.author: Olivier Bossel <olivier.bossel@gmail.com> (https://coffeekraken.io)

docblocks.name: List
docblocks.description: These classes allows you to apply list lnfs to any ul, ol, dl, etc...
feature: Support for vertical rhythm through the `s-rhythm:vertical` class
Support for text formatting through the `s-format:text` class
Support for scaling through the `s-scale:...` class
Support for colorizing through the `s-color:...` class

example.title: dl
example.code:
• Regional Creative Manager Evan Dare
  • Investor Program Agent Opal Weimann
  • Product Functionality Analyst Ashley Swift

example.title: ul
example.code:

  • Future Usability Developer Keith Sanford
  • Human Division Executive Ms. Danielle Sipes

example.title: ol
example.code:

  • Investor Communications Manager Joshua Howell
  • Regional Applications Technician Angelo Kshlerin

example.title: icon
example.code:

  • Direct Implementation Producer Tonya Kutch

docblocks.raw:
/** * * @name List * @namespace sugar.style.ui.list * @type Styleguide * @menu Styleguide / UI /styleguide/ui/lists * @platform css * @status stable * * These classes allows you to apply list lnfs to any ul, ol, dl, etc... * * @feature Support for vertical rhythm through the `s-rhythm:vertical` class * @feature Support for text formatting through the `s-format:text` class * @feature Support for scaling through the `s-scale:...` class * @feature Support for colorizing through the `s-color:...` class * * @support chromium * @support firefox * @support safari * @support edge * * @install css * \@s.ui.list.classes; * * .my-list { * @s.ui.list; * } * * @cssClass s-list Apply the dl list lnf * @cssClass s-list:ul Apply the ul list lnf * @cssClass s-list:ol Apply the ol list lnf * @cssClass s-list:icon Apply the icon list lnf * * @example html dl *
